CONTENT
Welcome to Bümerang! Hey, thank you for signing up! You're almost ready, just a few things you should know: Notice: Bümerang is in Beta! Cool, huh? That means some things might not work. But
we're working on it, don't worry
-Bümerang is an app for the short term exchange of things. This means you will be responsible for your own things, and doubly responsible for other's things. In that theme.. 

-Be responsible with your stuff. Be careful who you lend it to. 

-Be responsible with other people's things. 

-We aren't responsible for theft or loss of property. But it's our goal to make it as safe as possible to lend and borrow. 

** Privacy ** 

-Bümerang accesses Facebook for authorization, to set up your basic profile, and, if you wish, to share requests to your timeline. 

-Basic analytics are gathered using Google Analytics, Firebase and Facebook. 

-We make use of notifications on your phone. 

-Note that we take your privacy very seriously. 

** Notice ** 

-We're currently in Beta - that means you're a Beta user!
That also means some things may not work perfectly. If you discover anything strange, or if you'd just like to drop by and leave a comment, feel free to contact us! Our contact details are listed at http//www.bumerangapp.com
Enter a Phone Number
Bümerang requires a phone number. This is how you'll get in contact with people in order to lend and borrow, so we'd strongly encourage you to input a valid number.
 It's not public information; you will be always be asked to confirm before it is shared.
Extra Information(optional) You're all done. Happy sharing!
A phone number is needed to borrow and lend. You will always be notified before it is shared.
Guess nobody needs anything right now! Looks like nobody has anything to lend!
 Wanna lead the way? Hey, guess you don't need anything? Looks like you don't have anything to lend! Looks like you forgot to fill in a field! You forgot your phone number! You'll need it to lend and borrow. That phone number isn't valid. You'll need a valid one to lend and borrow! Sorry, an error has occurred.
We weren't able to connect to the internet. Please try again! We weren't able to connect to the internet, so we couldn't create your request. Please try again! We weren't able to connect to the internet, so we couldn't update your profile. Please try again! We weren't able to create your request. Please try again! Something went wrong! We're unable to show any requests. Oops, we weren't able to update your profile. Please try again. Request created! Your profile has been successfully updated! First Name
Sorry, we weren't able to get the details of that request. Please try again! Sorry, you can't accept your own request. That's very kind of you, but you can't accept the same request twice!

Delete request Are you sure you want to delete this request? Request successfully deleted! Unable to delete request. Please try again! Delete Cancel "Time travel not yet supported. Your request will be set for 2 hours. Post your request to Facebook Post your offer to Facebook
What is this? This is your karma. Karma let's other users immediately know how reliable you are. You gain karma when you lend and borrow items, returning them on time. You lose karma when you don't return items on time. Happy Sharing!
Notifications turned on! Notifications turned off! Notifications
